name: MicroDeft
title: Internship
feedback: Analyzed business requirements to design scalable software architectures, ensuring the solutions could grow with evolving needs. I developed secure front-end and back-end systems using React, Python, and Django, while managing databases such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB with a focus on optimizing performance. My role also involved conducting testing, deployment, and ongoing maintenance for enterprise applications. Additionally, I collaborated within agile teams to deliver customized software solutions tailored to client goals.
